description.narrative: The Caritas Denmark funded projects and activites are integrated elements of the country programmes and crisis response programmes funded by the Danish Ministry of Foreign Affairs and thereby adding to the same objectives and outcomes. The funding sources include Caritas Denmark collections, private contributers, the Danish Broadcast Collection etc.

participating-org.narrative: Catholic Office for Emergency Relief and Refugees (COERR)

recipient-country.narrative: Includes contingencies that will be spent in Myanmar, Uganda, and Niger.

description.narrative: 1st QTR expenditures under DBC projects (Adm in DK, travels, audits, evaluations, contingencies, and technical programme consultancy)
